pageProduct.name: Souvenaid Memory Drink Strawberry 4 Pack
pageProduct.description:
Information

Loading...

General Information

Nutricia Souvenaid is a medical nutrition drink that nutritionally supports memory function in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease.

Souvenaid is a medical nutrition drink that nutritionally supports memory function in the early stages of Alzheimer's disease. Taken once daily for 6 months, Souvenaid has been shown to benefit people during the early stages.

Product Claims: Gluten and lactose free (<0.02g/100g product).

Size: 4 Pack 125mL

Flavour: Strawberry

KEY FEATURES

• One a day drink
• Supports growth of brain connections
• Safe and well tolerated alone or in combination with Alzheimer's disease medication

Warnings

Not for individual sale. For more information see outer pack.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

For enteral use only. Must be used under medical supervision. Not suitable as a sole source of nutrition. Only to be used in addition to the normal diet. Not suitable for patients with galactosaemia.

Ingredients

Contains: Milk, Soy and Fish.

Allergen Contains: Fish| Milk| Soy

Allergen Free From: Gluten| Lactose

Directions

Take one bottle (125mL) once a day. Shake well before use. Ready to drink and best served chilled.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
